title: Poster, "Your Turn, My Turn", 1983
signed: Imprinted in black ink, lower right: c 1983 Made in space by April Greiman
inscribed: Imprinted in black ink, lower right, organized into two columns in descending diagonal.  First column is name of company and second is the name of representive from corresponding company. Emil De Piero/ Kimball and Artec Dewey Hodgdon, Rich Thompson/ Knoll International Lucia Mercer, Jhane Barnes/ Krueger Tom Tolleson/ Pacific-Condi Focus Charles Pelly/ Ron Rezek/Lighting Ron Rezek/ Scandiline/CADO Stan Hutchinson/ The Shaw-Walker Company Robert A.M. Below in black: For additional information/ call 213 854 6367.
description: Poster for symposium for International Contract Furniture Design Symposium. Images and text integrated throughout. Upper center text, Your Turn / My Turn / 1983 in blue and red; set on a rising diagonal. In upper left corner are letters PDC2 in separate colored squares. Additional text describing event (i.e. sponsors, featured designers) found in lower left and lower right. Sideway "P" shpae against black triangle slanting toward lower right corner.  Imprinted inside section shaped like "P" in blue The International/ Contract Furniture/ Design Symposium/ during WestWeek (in pink)/ Your Turn/ My Turn '83/ A PDC 2 Invitional Event/ Friday, March 18 and / Saturady, March 19/ Pacific Design Center/ Los Angeles (in pink). Images of globes (upper and center left), celestial bodies (lower left and center), and abstract shapes (lower right) layered with text.

tombstone.epitaph: Poster, "Your Turn, My Turn", 1983. Offset color lithograph on paper. Gift of April Greiman. 1995-167-3.
